channel.title: Experienced 562 Coders Please Read!
channel.description:
Hey, Ive got a 562 Server and the Base is Rs2Hd. There are a few Glitches/Problems and things I want on my Server. If I ask for something and you have found a thread to tell me how to do that, Please post the Link. Anyway this is what im Stuck on:
- When you trade it doesnt show what you will Give and Recieve on the second screen. - When you drop Items they Disappear - Is there any way how to make it so I dont even need to run the source? So the server is already Activated all of the time. - How would I add Ancient Curses? - How would I add a Fun Pk?
Thanks a Lot! I will Rep++ for an Answer for even one Question that works!

item.title: Experienced 562 Coders Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @dds_ledg dds ledg
item.description:
@dds_ledg wrote:

Hey, Ive got a 562 Server and the Base is Rs2Hd. There are a few Glitches/Problems and things I want on my Server. If I ask for something and you have found a thread to tell me how to do that, Please post the Link. Anyway this is what im Stuck on:

  • When you trade it doesnt show what you will Give and Recieve on the second screen.
  • When you drop Items they Disappear
  • Is there any way how to make it so I dont even need to run the source? So the server is already Activated all of the time.
  • How would I add Ancient Curses?
  • How would I add a Fun Pk?

Thanks a Lot! I will Rep++ for an Answer for even one Question that works!

Read full topic
